title: 闲的没事 发4块金锭
author: Tian_Duan
txt_content:
无聊 无聊 无聊 重要的事情重复3遍无语死了
找几个好朋友玩玩服务器去
求回血
中奖率50%
求大家吐槽一切

replies.author: Tian_Duan
replies.txt_content: 我自己带走1个试试 23333333

replies.author: Tian_Duan
replies.txt_content: 没人回复万岁~\(≧▽≦)/~

replies.author: NobleGolden
replies.txt_content: 我就是来拿个金锭 ==

replies.author: scorpio975
replies.txt_content:
说好的100%呢...
中了就回血~

replies.author: Tian_Duan
replies.txt_content:

我就是来拿个金锭 ==
我靠 什么鬼你自己吞了

replies.txt_content:
